attributes.action: GET RID OF TOM WATSON AS THE DEPUTY LEADER OF LABOUR PARTY AND RESIGN AS MP
attributes.additional_details: So people let's sign this petition to show that the public matter. Let's get rid of this useless MP and useless Labour deputy leader. Peoples choice people's voice MATTERS.
attributes.background: Tom Watson has lost the battle in the Black Country to keep Britain in the EU. He always supports the cuts to benefits and the wars that have taken place in the last decade. He has the worst attendance record in Parliament. Not forgetting his scandal in Glasgow which he kept as a secret.
